00024 #include "LinearSolver.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix_sparse.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/banded.hpp>
00028 #include <iostream>

00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace pwiz::util;

00035 
00036 namespace ublas = boost::numeric::ublas;
00037 
00038 
00039 ostream* os_ = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 void testDouble()
00043 {
00044     if (os_) *os_ << "testDouble()\n";
00045 
00046     LinearSolver<> solver;
00047 
00048     ublas::matrix<double> A(2,2);
00049     A(0,0) = 1; A(0,1) = 2;
00050     A(1,0) = 3; A(1,1) = 4;
00051    
00052     ublas::vector<double> y(2);
00053     y(0) = 5;
00054     y(1) = 11;
00055 
00056     ublas::vector<double> x = solver.solve(A, y);
00057 
00058     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00059     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00060     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00061 
00062     unit_assert(x(0) == 1.);
00063     unit_assert(x(1) == 2.);
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 void testComplex()
00068 {
00069     if (os_) *os_ << "testComplex()\n";
00070 
00071     LinearSolver<> solver;
00072     
00073     ublas::matrix< complex<double> > A(2,2);
00074     A(0,0) = 1; A(0,1) = 2;
00075     A(1,0) = 3; A(1,1) = 4;
00076    
00077     ublas::vector< complex<double> > y(2);
00078     y(0) = 5;
00079     y(1) = 11;
00080 
00081     ublas::vector< complex<double> > x = solver.solve(A, y);
00082 
00083     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00084     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00085     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00086 
00087     unit_assert(x(0) == 1.);
00088     unit_assert(x(1) == 2.);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void testDoubleQR()
00092 {
00093     if (os_) *os_ << "testDoubleQR()\n";
00094 
00095     LinearSolver<LinearSolverType_QR> solver;
00096 
00097     ublas::matrix<double> A(2,2);
00098     A(0,0) = 1.; A(0,1) = 2.;
00099     A(1,0) = 3.; A(1,1) = 4.;
00100    
00101     ublas::vector<double> y(2);
00102     y(0) = 5.;
00103     y(1) = 11.;
00104 
00105     ublas::vector<double> x = solver.solve(A, y);
00106 
00107     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00108     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00109     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00110 
00111     if (os_) *os_ << x(0) << " - 1. = " << x(0) - 1. << endl;
00112 
00113     unit_assert_equal(x(0), 1., 1e-14);
00114     unit_assert_equal(x(1), 2., 1e-14);
00115 }

00143 
00144 void testSparse()
00145 {
00146     if (os_) *os_ << "testSparse()\n";
00147 
00148     LinearSolver<> solver;
00149 
00150     ublas::mapped_matrix<double> A(2,2,4);
00151     A(0,0) = 1.; A(0,1) = 2.;
00152     A(1,0) = 3.; A(1,1) = 4.;
00153    
00154     ublas::vector<double> y(2);
00155     y(0) = 5.;
00156     y(1) = 11.;
00157 
00158     ublas::vector<double> x = solver.solve(A, y);
00159 
00160     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00161     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00162     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00163 
00164     unit_assert_equal(x(0), 1., 1e-14);
00165     unit_assert_equal(x(1), 2., 1e-14);
00166 }

00195 
00196 void testBanded()
00197 {
00198     if (os_) *os_ << "testBanded()\n";
00199 
00200     LinearSolver<> solver;
00201 
00202     ublas::banded_matrix<double> A(2,2,1,1);
00203     A(0,0) = 1.; A(0,1) = 2.;
00204     A(1,0) = 3.; A(1,1) = 4.;
00205    
00206     ublas::vector<double> y(2);
00207     y(0) = 5.;
00208     y(1) = 11.;
00209 
00210     ublas::vector<double> x = solver.solve(A, y);
00211 
00212     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00213     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00214     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00215 
00216     unit_assert_equal(x(0), 1., 1e-14);
00217     unit_assert_equal(x(1), 2., 1e-14);
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 void testBandedComplex()
00222 {
00223     if (os_) *os_ << "testBandedComplex()\n";
00224 
00225     LinearSolver<> solver;
00226 
00227     ublas::banded_matrix< complex<double> > A(2,2,1,1);
00228     A(0,0) = 1.; A(0,1) = 2.;
00229     A(1,0) = 3.; A(1,1) = 4.;
00230    
00231     ublas::vector< complex<double> > y(2);
00232     y(0) = 5.;
00233     y(1) = 11.;
00234 
00235     ublas::vector< complex<double> > x = solver.solve(A, y);
00236 
00237     if (os_) *os_ << "A: " << A << endl;
00238     if (os_) *os_ << "y: " << y << endl;
00239     if (os_) *os_ << "x: " << x << endl;
00240 
00241     unit_assert(norm(x(0)-1.) < 1e-14);
00242     unit_assert(norm(x(1)-2.) < 1e-14);
00243 }

00245 
00246 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00247 {
00248     try
00249     {
00250         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00251         if (os_) *os_ << "LinearSolverTest\n";
00252 
00253         testDouble();
00254         testComplex();
00255         testDoubleQR();
00256         //testComplexQR();
00257         testSparse();
00258         //testSparseComplex(); // lu_factorize doesn't like mapped_matrix<complex> 
00259         testBanded();
00260         testBandedComplex();
00261         return 0;
00262     }
00263     catch (exception& e)
00264     {
00265         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00266         return 1;
00267     }
00268 }
